title: Priority Cards, User Profiles & Changelog History
changes: Added priority flag system to mark cards for more frequent review
Quick-toggle priority stars in deck view - click to mark/unmark cards instantly
New user profile page with bio, password change, and account info
Changelog history page to see all past updates and features
Review sessions now prioritize flagged cards (70% priority, 30% regular mix)
Profile and What's New links added to navigation menu
